name: The Old Ball and Chain (Leith Reardon, Devious Squire)
name_original: The Old Ball and Chain (Leith Reardon, Devious Squire)
description:
Sisyphus has been punished for cheating death (twice) and must eternally push a boulder up a mountain in Hell. But did anyone bother to tell him that? Tethered to your rock, you must navigate through this literal hellscape to fight your way back to the land of the living. Will you make it out? Find out in this new puzzle platformer adventure!

Made for the Game Makers Toolkit 2021 Game Jam

Controls:

Use the left and right arrows to move
Click to pick up the boulder
Click to throw the boulder (hold on tight!)
Press the space bar to jump
Press up and down  arrows to climb the chain and walls (make sure the ball is in the direction you are trying to climb!)

Team:

Timur Avni - Level Designer/Music and Sound

Ashleigh Cheyne - Background and Character Artist

Carl M - Tilemap and Object Artist

Stuart Ralphson - Programming/Sound Implementation

Leith Reardon - Lead Programmer
